title: Have you ever been told or taught a philosophy on something by someone who clearly doesn’t practice what they preach? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah. The same lunatic I have mentioned earlier. He talked about inner peace all the time, and Sadhguru was his big hero. The thing is that he didnt practice what he preached at all. Never seen anyone with more lack of self awarness and touch with reality. I can only laugh.
Professors taught me about Plato, Aristotle, Kant, Hegel, and Heidegger, and, seriously, students don't expect them to practice what they preach.
